Sense: female (human) who parents a child, gives birth to a baby, or is pregnant
Constraints: Skip:mama (informal in most of the source languages)

Sense: vital liquid flowing in human and animal bodies
large mass of earth and rock
dead body | a dead body | body of a dead animal | –
visible particles and vapour given off by burning material
approximately spherical or ellipsoidal body produced by birds, insects, reptiles, and other animals, housing the embryo within a membrane or shell during its development
a celestial body appearing as a point of light on the clear night sky, whose position is relatively fixed with respect to each other
blue-coloured — see also dark blue, light blue
